overview: Devilishly desirable - these girls like it as deep as possible! In the latest Kovi spectacular, The Devil Deep Inside, Michelle Wild stars with six other beautiful babes and one other special guest: the Devil himself! With six hot hardcore scenes, this film features mysterious angels, fortune tellers, devils, and dirty demon-ettes. The devil and his minions are concocting a cosmic plot to take over the world by stealing angelic Michelle Wild's virginity during the alignment of Mars and Jupiter, bringing an age-old prophecy to life!
title: The Devil Deep Inside
